name: Sarah M.
text: Found an amazing plumber through FixIt Finder within hours. Fixed our leaky pipe the same day. The cost calculator helped us know what to expect.

name: James K.
text: After storm damage, we needed a roof repair fast. Got three quotes through the site and had the work done within a week. Excellent experience.

name: Maria L.
text: The DIY guides helped me fix a simple outlet issue myself. When I needed a panel upgrade, I used FixIt Finder to find a licensed electrician. Great resource!

name: Robert P.
text: Used the HVAC sizing calculator before getting quotes. It helped me understand exactly what I needed. The contractor confirmed the calculator was spot-on.

name: Jennifer W.
text: Needed our exterior repainted and used FixIt Finder to compare estimates. The painting cost calculator was really helpful for budgeting.

name: David H.
text: The step-by-step drain cleaning guide saved me a service call. Clear instructions and helpful tips. Bookmarked the site for future reference.

name: Lisa T.
text: Found a fantastic landscaper for our backyard redesign. The project planner checklist kept us organized throughout the entire process.

name: Michael C.
text: The roofing cost estimator was incredibly accurate. Got our roof replaced and the final cost was within 5% of the estimate. Highly recommend.
